SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302tailproject
Package com.example.cab302tailproject.DAO

Interface UserDAO

All Known Subinterfaces:
StudentDAO, TeacherDAO
All Known Implementing Classes:
SqliteTeacherDAO, SqlStudentDAO
public interface UserDAO
Base Data Access Object interface for user operations. Defines common methods for checking email, password, and retrieving basic user details.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    checkEmail(String email)
    Checks if an email is registered in the specific user table (Student or Teacher).
    boolean
    checkPassword(String email, String password)
    Checks if the provided plain text password matches the stored hashed password for the given email.
    UserDetail
    getUserNameDetails(String email)
    Retrieves the first and last name of a user based on their email.

  • Method Details

    • checkEmail

      boolean checkEmail(String email)
      Checks if an email is registered in the specific user table (Student or Teacher).
      Parameters:
      email - The email to check.
      Returns:
      true if the email exists, false otherwise.

    • checkPassword

      boolean checkPassword(String email, String password)
      Checks if the provided plain text password matches the stored hashed password for the given email.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email.
      password - The plain text password to check.
      Returns:
      true if the password matches, false otherwise.

    • getUserNameDetails

      UserDetail getUserNameDetails(String email)
      Retrieves the first and last name of a user based on their email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      Returns:
      A UserDetail object containing the first and last name, or null if the user is not found or an error occurs.
